original_text: Wicked people have to do evil things. They cannot go to sleep unless they have been cruel to someone that day. Wicked people have to do evil things. They cannot go to sleep unless they have been cruel to someone that day.
korean_text: 그들은 악을 행하지 못하면 자지 못하며 사람을 넘어뜨리지 못하면 잠이 오지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: Wicked people have to do evil things.
unless they have been cruel to someone that day.
